title: The Games Destiny Plays
description: The Last Good An Original Sinners novella told in five parts.Part The Games Destiny PlaysShocked to see Nora's bruises, Lance is furious that she put herself in danger and demands to know where she got them. As Nora confesses her true nature, she's equally shocked to learn that Lance has some secrets of his own, drawing them together despite Kingsley's orders....
author: Tiffany Reisz
